website_summaries.verdict: This no-frills date stamp works as promised, and offers a basic design at a budget price. However, it also has fewer years of dates than others on our list.
pros: Has a straightforward design that is easy to use
cons: Some confusion about the years it includes, and has about 4 fewer years of dates than other dates stamps
Tends to transfer ink to your fingers when changing the dates

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a date stamp for my fresh eggs. It definitely takes practice to stamp an egg. I love all the stamping options, I didn't realize it offered more than merely the month/day/year! The year goes to 2020 on mine. After that I point I will just leave the year off. For under $6, this is fantastic and worth getting (even if you need to replace it in a couple years!)
customer_reviews.author: TabbieFayth

customer_reviews.title: Look Closely at Photo and Description
customer_reviews.text: This date stamp is good as far as quality. Unfortunately though, two of the six years on the dial have already happened. I should have looked closer at the picture and description. I wanted a date stamp with only dates but the dial with the year also has other choices like a.m., p.m., rec'd, ans'd.....thus ONLY 6 years on the dial. My old date stamp lasted 11 years, all useable at the time of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joan K Anderson

customer_reviews.title: It Looks Like a Nice Date Stamp
customer_reviews.text: I received my SPARCO date stamper (SPR01494) on 3/29/2019. My stamper covers these years: 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020, 2021 and 2022. There are also abbreviations that can be used after the month and the date. Instead of entering a year, you can choose from these items: PAID, A.M., P.M., REC’D, ENT’D and ANS’D. The width of the actual stamp on paper is about one inch and the height of the numbers, etc., is about 3/16”. The quality appears to be very good. I will make an update if it breaks. This item had free shipping; I was looking at one that was about the same price, but the shipping was $5.99.
customer_reviews.author: Monte Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: I use this in my classroom where I need to ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my classroom where I need to have student's work dated. They might forget to "write in the date" but they (1st-2nd grade) never miss the opportunity to use the date stamp and the stamp pad. An old-school solution that still works. Sneaky teacher.
customer_reviews.author: Classic_Mom_Md

customer_reviews.title: Already 33% Outdated
customer_reviews.text: The date stamp is fine. The problem is somebody is getting rid of their outdated back stock. The stamp is only good for six years. I ordered my stamp in December 2018, and the stamp that arrived yesterday features the years 2017 and 2018.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel F. Layman

customer_reviews.title: Gret stampa and in the old "standard" size.
customer_reviews.text: For some reason the office supply stores decided to enlarge the size of the old standard size date stamps that they have used for 50+ years. The type size is the same but the frame is higher to accommodate longer length bands to add another number. I have some older customized (and expensive) stamps that I want to continue using so I have bought new date stamps in order to take them apart and install a new "year" band on my old customized stamps. This one is the same size as the old standard. It works great and the quality appears better than the old office supply store brands.
customer_reviews.author: Recon

customer_reviews.title: We use this twice each week and it is a great, sturdy little product
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed. I am a homeschooling mom and we use this stamp to stamp our fake passports in our geography lessons as we study each country. We use this twice each week and it is a great, sturdy little product. It's a great little size that is easy for me to stow away in our desk when it is not in use.
customer_reviews.author: D Hancock

customer_reviews.title: sparco date stamper for our eggs
customer_reviews.text: Me and the wife got some chickens early this year and when we started to get tons of eggs we wanted a way to keep track of the dates. We got this and a stamp we can add the dates to the eggs as we harvest them. It is safe and works great!
customer_reviews.author: DC 🐧

customer_reviews.title: Teacher must-have
customer_reviews.text: I always stamp my papers and it has saved me from grading over and over! I stamp the date that I send the papers home and then told the students they could turn in corrections 5 days after the stamped date. Life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Ogden

customer_reviews.title: Updated years!
customer_reviews.text: Nice date stamp. I just received it and the years are 2016-2021. Just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: tksbaskets

customer_reviews.title: Teacher tool
customer_reviews.text: First grade teacher. Students have difficulty writing the date. So I walk around and stamp the date on papers for them. Simple and easy. Time saver.
customer_reviews.author: GR15

customer_reviews.title: I purchased two of these and they are horrible. The little spurs to change the date are ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these and they are horrible. The little spurs to change the date are impossible to use without getting the ink all over your fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Had read some reviews that the year range started in 2015, but for the price I wasn’t too worried about it. When I opened it, I was surprised to see that the years started in 2017! Yay! Definitely get this. Great stamps and we’ll be using it for years.
customer_reviews.author: Kaydee

customer_reviews.title: Very legible date stamp
customer_reviews.text: Used it on different surfaces and it worked quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Pacl

customer_reviews.title: The PERFECT Date (and time) Stamp!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this date stamp! Perfect for all kinds of projects and memory keeping -- and the roller date year goes from 2015 to 2020. There are also ways to just stamp the time with A.M. and P.M., as well as "PAID", "REC'D" (recorded), "ENT'D" (entered), and "ANS'D" (answered).
customer_reviews.author: Steph D.

customer_reviews.title: Not really six year
customer_reviews.text: I just got this. It works well. It seems fine. But I wanted to note that I ordered this May 2013 and it comes with years from 2010 to 2015. Maybe they'll get a new shipment with updated years. Until then perhaps look for one that will have a better date range. These stamps are cheap, but why replace them more often than necessary?
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Got this for scrapbooking, does the job and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for scrapbooking, does the job and the dates included 2016-2021 I believe. I only gave 3 stars because it stamps a bit unevenly, the month holds a lot of ink and kept stamping very heavy when the day and Year stamped perfectly. Sometimes the year wasn't legible because it held so much ink when I stamped. I was also using a brand new ink pad so that could have contributed.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Furlin

customer_reviews.title: Great for for organization
customer_reviews.text: This stamp does exactly what I need it to do. It is easy to select the correct date and helps me to keep paperwork organized.
customer_reviews.author: W. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: I use this for journaling...
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my "visual" journalling, as opposed to regular office work and papers. Seems to work well with all sorts of stamp inks and dyes. It cleans up nicely. The dials are easy to turn but stiff enough to stay in place, even with travelling.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni & Mike Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Ink does not seem to adhere to this properly and ...
customer_reviews.text: Ink does not seem to adhere to this properly and it smudges on the paper, but it does the job in my Kindergarten classroom for stamping writing journals.
customer_reviews.author: MrsKindergarten

customer_reviews.title: Good price, served the purpose
customer_reviews.text: Good price, served the purpose. My date stamp in the school library expired so I needed one with a current date. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Eyed Moose

customer_reviews.title: This is a great stamper for me because the date fits in where ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed this date stamper as I have to set up multiple work stations this year because of the staff changes in my school district. This is a great stamper for me because the date fits in where I have to put it. I know some have complained that they didn't think the stamped date was big enough, but it works for my needs. I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: linky

customer_reviews.title: Very acceptable pricing
customer_reviews.text: It does what i needed it to. If i ever need another, this will be it
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Does what it should well. My only issue is that it only has so many years to stamp, but I already knew that so I wasn’t blindsided by it or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: My wife says it does the job.
customer_reviews.text: My wife says it does the job. And saves her time from writing the date on her students papers
customer_reviews.author: Dre King

customer_reviews.title: Chicken stamp
customer_reviews.text: It is great in keeping track of when my chickens lay their eggs each day. I also bought the food safe ink with this.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Beach

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace my old stamper for a church function I do. This one has years that go way into the future so I won't need to buy another one for a long time. Some said it was cheap quality but I don't think so. It does the job just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rsquared00

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I guess it would be nice if ever it arrives....
customer_reviews.author: Arturo  Revelo

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Rubber is good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This stanp is great. Its about the size of number 12 times new roman type
customer_reviews.author: t.r

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Dates were not as shown in picture, and only went for four years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but really useful when students turn in papers
customer_reviews.text: A little on the small side, but really useful when students turn in papers!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Prothero

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: On time and works great. Well made. Have used it since I received it.
customer_reviews.author: The Shopper

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It was old as the rubber was dry and hard and not current year dates.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Becker

customer_reviews.title: good good
customer_reviews.text: im buying this in 2017 and as far as the 6 year thing mine has 2016 through 2021, so im happy
customer_reviews.author: brianna

customer_reviews.title: Great Date Stamper
customer_reviews.text: Great rubber stamp! Exactly what I needed and at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Boundaryroad_95

customer_reviews.title: A little surprised that 2016 was still on this date ...
customer_reviews.text: A little surprised that 2016 was still on this date stamper but I guess the slightly lower price was to clear out last year's stock.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The print is too small for 80 year old eyes. I made a mistake with this.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. James A. Glasscock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I date all incoming mail and this stamp works great.
customer_reviews.author: Ralston

customer_reviews.title: tiny lettering
customer_reviews.text: miniscule font, good for ants to read. cheap quality too. go with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This looks just like the picture, I just wish the handle area was a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Quin Kowalski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for teachers
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I use it to stamp my first graders' writing.
customer_reviews.author: Knit Guy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set and use. One of my 'needful' things!
customer_reviews.author: Lee V.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: The price is awesome, especially because this is an awesome product! Perfect for keeping track of writing goals in my classroom!
customer_reviews.author: C47

customer_reviews.title: Havent used it yet!
customer_reviews.text: I havent used this yet but it looks really well built and it was really cheap so an awesome buy!
customer_reviews.author: LanceBender

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stamp!
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I wanted and has later dates too. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle aka Naila Moon

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Perfect for my class!
customer_reviews.author: R. K. Smart

customer_reviews.title: Sparco Date Stamper
customer_reviews.text: Great product; I have absolutely no complaints about this date stamper. The price is right! I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: avidreader

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't get any better than this
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and half the price than at an office supply store
customer_reviews.author: Bernie the Attorney

customer_reviews.title: I've re-ordered this stamper a few times, very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I like the font size of this, bigger than some but not huge. I have re-ordered this date stamper the last few times I needed one (not because they wore out, but because as time marched on the current year surpassed the latest year on the stamper).
customer_reviews.author: Bryan S. Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is 7 and wants to be a librarian..so got this for her to play "library" old school!
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie E. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was hoping for! Small letters, vintage stamp look. PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: JJ O'Neil

customer_reviews.title: Date Stamp
customer_reviews.text: Stamp works great for stamping dated homework in student homework journals. Will purchase more from this company when the time comes to add more.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie S. Reamy

customer_reviews.title: It's little! But does the job
customer_reviews.text: Nice clear stamping, easy to change the date without getting messy hands. I could only wish it had some kind of case, but otherwise I am quite satisfied. I was surprised at how small it is!
customer_reviews.author: jericacadman

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: i was looking for a date stamper, and this is the best one i found for the price. i would recommend it for most purposes.
customer_reviews.author: soundwaveclick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great, love it, nostalgic for the school days in the library
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Dented Product makes it difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: The product came quickly, but it is dented, so very difficult to rotate the numbers. I should have just purchased it in a store so I could make an easy exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

product_meta.title: Sparco Date Stamper, 4 Bands, Size No.1’1/2, Imprint 1 -1/16" x 5/32" (SPR01494
product_meta.description: Six-year date stamp offers a nickel-plated steel frame and unbreakable wheels

Endless rubber bands with deep-face characters make perfect impressions
